players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I investigated Diana last night and confirmed she's the mafia. Please vote her off so the town can win."
Diana: "I didn’t kill Alice. I think Charlie is lying or a liar, maybe he's the mafia. Vote him off."
You: remained silent.
Charlie: "I investigated Diana last night and confirmed she’s the mafia who killed Alice. No one else fits. Vote her off. Bob, trust my report."
Diana: "Bob, I think you’re the silent mafia. Let’s vote Bob."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Diana knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Diana last night and confirmed she's the mafia. Please vote her off so the town can win."
Diana: "I didn’t kill Alice. I think Charlie is lying or a liar, maybe he's the mafia. Vote him off."
Bob: remained silent.
You: "I investigated Diana last night and confirmed she’s the mafia who killed Alice. No one else fits. Vote her off. Bob, trust my report."
Diana: "Bob, I think you’re the silent mafia. Let’s vote Bob."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I investigated Diana last night and confirmed she's the mafia. Please vote her off so the town can win."
You: "I didn’t kill Alice. I think Charlie is lying or a liar, maybe he's the mafia. Vote him off."
Bob: remained silent.
Charlie: "I investigated Diana last night and confirmed she’s the mafia who killed Alice. No one else fits. Vote her off. Bob, trust my report."
You: "Bob, I think you’re the silent mafia. Let’s vote Bob."
